entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this evening. A few flurries and rain showers beginning near midnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h before morning. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Monday 13 March 2023
